pages.text: Follow this route on the Path of the Equinox if you want to freeze your foes solid with highly damaging ice. Ice-based Augments have a big boost, and damage is increased by Dangerous. Elemental magic of any kind is further boosted by Elemental, and fury spells gain twice the XP as normal thanks to Furious.

pages.mods: Dangerous/Pact of Danger, Ice Aspect, Elemental, Furious
